docs.title: Welcome to CloudAtlas
docs.text:
🚀 AI Consulting and Innovation Hi, I’m Ozgur Guler, an AI Cloud Solutions Architect, consultant and a startup advisor. I specialize in building generative AI solutions. I write about AI technology, AI investments landscape and building in the cloud.

Subscribe to my Newsletter Work with me

docs.title: Consulting Services
docs.text:
With extensive experience working alongside startups, I’ve partnered with a dozen companies to successfully navigate the complexities of AI product development. I’ve seen what strategies deliver results and what pitfalls to avoid.

At CloudAtlas, we empower businesses with cutting-edge AI solutions. Explore our services, projects, and thought leadership.
